name: Advanced Featured Page Widget
author: Jeremy Murimi

sections.description:
• Feature page by selecting individual pages.
  • Allows multiple widgets each featuring a different page.
  • Use the page title or enter your own title for each widget.
  • Option to show featured image.
  • Uses page content with content character limit options
  • Option for “show more” text
  • Option to select the desired image size
  • Option to set image alignment in the widget.

Arbitrary section 1
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Enable the Widget through the Appearance –> Widgets tab.
  4. Edit the widget Settings in your widget Administration Panel.
sections.faq:
Can I request a feature?

Yes, please do so on the WordPress support forum for the plugin. I will consider it and if I feel it is worth adding, I will schedule it for a future release.

How can I use shortcode or template tag?

It is coming with our nest release

Can i use it anywhere else apart from the sidebar

Yes you only need to register widget areas in function.php file

short_description: This plugin allows you to add a featured page using a widget.
